Returns: the Euler angle of the of the face, for the given axis
Parameters: int: the Euler axis to retrieve an angle from (EULER_X, EULER_Y or EULER_Z)
pose(int).Description: Returns the face's pose. That is, the rotations around either the X, Y or Z axis (the positions in 3-dimensional Euclidean space).

Parameters: PointF: the PointF coordinates (float values) of the face's mid-point
getMidPoint(android.graphics.PointF).Description: Sets the position of the mid-point between the eyes.

confidence().Description: Returns a confidence factor between 0 and 1. This indicates how certain what has been found is actually a face. A confidence factor above 0.3 is usually good enough.

eyesDistance().Description: Returns the distance between the eyes.

ClassDesc: A Face contains all the information identifying the location of a face in a bitmap.
